title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 7: Anaerobic Power & RSA (Repeat Sprint Ability)
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Boost ability to repeat high‑intensity efforts with minimal drop‑off.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: RSA: 10–12x15m shuttle sprints (record times; target <7% decrement)

notes: Week 1: 10x15m shuttles, r:30''. Week 2: 12x15m; monitor decrement.
